directions: In a slow cooker, combine the tomatoes, garbanzo beans, zucchini, onion, carrots, celery, red bell pepper, green bell pepper, chili powder, green chile peppers, garlic, oregano, cumin and salt.
Cover and cook on low for 6 to 8 hours OR on high for 3 to 4 hours.
ingredients: 1 (28 ounce) can whole peeled tomatoes with juice
1 (4 ounce) can chopped green chile peppers
title: Slow Cooker Vegetable Chili
